Title: Green Mountain Grills Peak Prime 2.0 WiFi Pellet Grill - Peak Prime
Description:
Key FeaturesWiFi capabilities allow you to control and monitor grill with your smartphoneRounded/Peaked Hybrid Chamber Design provides optimal heat distributionLid window and hopper window let you check your food and pellets without opening grillTemperature range of 150 to 550 degrees Fahrenheit can be adjusted in 5 degree incrementsThe 18 lb capacity pellet hopper allows for hours of uninterrupted cooking timeElevate your backyard BBQ with the all-new PEAK PRIME™ 2.0. Achieve the highest quality wood-fired flavor by harnessing 12-V Direct Power with unrivaled heat consistency and temperature control. The new rounded/peaked hybrid chamber design provides for optimal heat distribution and smoke circulation creating a superior 360° of wood-fired greatness. The PRIME 2.0 design changes the game of backyard versatility and customization. Enabled with GMG RACKT™ technology, this grill can be easily equipped with elevated racks, smoke shelves, cooking pans, griddles, you name it! When you're ready to turn the heat up, the GMG SideBURN™ attachment can easily transform your side shelf into a high heat side burner. The new GMG PRIME 2.0 App makes it even easier to control and monitor your grill from anywhere. Take your BBQ to the edge of backyard greatness with the new industry standard of pellet grilling!Legal disclaimers and warnings

Product packaging, owners’ manuals, installation instructions, and/or operating instructions may include more information than what is shown on our website. The content on our site is intended to be used for reference purposes only. Please fully read all included manuals and documentation before installing or using this product. WARNING for California residents: this product may contain chemical(s) known to the state of California to cause birth defects, cancer, or other reproductive harm.

Title: Green Mountain Grills Trek Prime 2.0 WiFi Pellet Grill - Trek Prime
Description:
Key FeaturesWiFi capabilities allow you to control and monitor grill with your smartphoneTemperature range of 150 to 550 degrees Fahrenheit can be adjusted in 5 degree incrementsThe 9 lb capacity pellet hopper allows for hours of uninterrupted cooking timeRounded/Peaked Hybrid Chamber Design provides optimal heat distributionYour wood-fired adventure starts with the all-new TREK PRIME™ 2.0. This little guy packs some serious wood-fired flavor by harnessing 12-V Direct Power with unrivaled heat consistency and temperature control. Whether you're championing your backyard BBQ or hitting the road camping or tailgating, the TREK gets the job done. The new rounded/peaked hybrid chamber provides for optimal heat distribution and smoke circulation creating a superior 360° of wood-fired greatness. The PRIME 2.0 design changes the game of backyard versatility and customization. Elevate your TREK with the new TREK CART, a reinforced steel chassis with a seamless form-fitted connection. Cart sold separately. The new GMG PRIME 2.0 App makes it even easier to control and monitor your grill from anywhere. Fire up your TREK to backyard BBQ greatness with the new industry standard of pellet grilling!Legal disclaimers and warnings

Title: Green Mountain Grills Wood-Fired Pizza Attachment for Peak/Ledge & Jim Bowie/Daniel Boone Grills - GMG-4023
Description:
Key FeaturesTurns your pellet grill into a wood-fired pizza ovenGets hot enough to bake restaurant quality pizzas in 2-4 minutes Great for baking bread and even searing steaksReaches temperatures between 400 and 900 degrees FahrenheitFits GMG Peak, Ledge, Jim Bowie, and Daniel Boone pellet grillsConvert your GMG pellet grill into a wood-wired gourmet pizza oven. The pizza oven attachment captures and funnels the heat from the firebox directly up and into the steel baking chamber encasing the pizza stone. This process raises the internal temperature of your pellet grill to that of a real wood burning pizza oven. It creates temperatures upwards of 800 degree Fahrenheit, allowing you to cook restaurant quality pizza in 2-4 minutes. It is also useful for baking bread at 400-600 degrees Fahrenheit and searing steaks at 900 degrees Fahrenheit. This attachment fits Peak, Ledge, Jim Bowie, and Daniel Boone grills.Legal disclaimers and warnings

Title: Green Mountain Grills 28 Lb. Hardwood Pellets - Fruitwood Blend
Description:
Key FeaturesMade from kiln-dried, 100% pure hardwoodNatural lignin in wood binds the pellets together without the need for additivesBold blend of Orchard Cherry, American Beech, and Sweet Pecan adds a light sweetness to your foodFlavor profile goes great with beef, pork, poultry, and breadThis bold blend of Orchard Cherry, American Beech, and Sweet Pecan (yes, pecan is a fruit!) smells sweet when you cook with it and adds character to whatever you grill. Premium Fruitwood Blend is favored by competition barbecue teams and grillers nationwide for its flavorful light smoke. GMG pellets are produced from 100% kiln-dried sawdust which stays clean throughout the process. The natural lignin present in all woods binds the pellets together without any additives whatsoever.Legal disclaimers and warnings

Title: Green Mountain Grills 28 Lb. Hardwood Pellets - Gold Blend
Description:
Key FeaturesMade from kiln-dried, 100% pure hardwoodNatural lignin in wood binds the pellets together without the need for additivesMellow blend of Red Oak, American Hickory, and Mountain Maple flavors food without overpowering itFlavor profile goes great with almost anything - from beef, poultry, and pork, to veggies and baked goodsThis mellow blend of Red Oak, American Hickory, and Mountain Maple subtly flavors your food without overpowering it. These are some of the hardest of the hardwoods and produce a long burn with modest smoke. GMG pellets are produced from 100% kiln-dried sawdust which stays clean throughout the process. Title: Green Mountain Grills 28 Lb. Hardwood Pellets - Apple Blend
Description:
Key FeaturesMade from kiln-dried, 100% pure hardwoodNatural lignin in wood binds the pellets together without the need for additivesSublime blend of Apple Wood, American Hickory, and Red Oak adds a subtle smoky sweetness to your foodFlavor profile goes great with pork, poultry, vegetables, and breadThis sublime blend of Apple Wood, American Hickory, and Red Oak is mature but gentle. If you are unsure about which pellets to use, choose the Apple blend for hardy flavors. You cannot go wrong with this one! GMG pellets are produced from 100% kiln-dried sawdust which stays clean throughout the process. The natural lignin present in all woods binds the pellets together without any additives whatsoever.
